com.leinardi.android.speeddial

Class SpeedDialView.ScrollingViewSnackbarBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.design.widget.CoordinatorLayout.Behavior<android.view.View>
      • com.leinardi.android.speeddial.SpeedDialView.SnackbarBehavior
        • com.leinardi.android.speeddial.SpeedDialView.ScrollingViewSnackbarBehavior
  • Enclosing class:
    SpeedDialView

    public static class SpeedDialView.ScrollingViewSnackbarBehavior
extends SpeedDialView.SnackbarBehavior
    Behavior designed for use with View instances. Its main function is to move View views so that any displayed Snackbars do not cover them.
